p: Following the standard methodology used in previous studies [ 80], Figure 4 and Figure 5 show the results of PCA- and SOM-based clustering analysis using the orthogonal descriptors for ZIKV sequences [ 81]. For PCA and SOM calculations, the standard MATLAB program package and in-house developed software were applied, respectively [ 82]. The data set consists of 310 genome sequences of ZIKV hosted in different species (83% in Homo sapiens, 17% in Simiiformes, Aedes, Macaca or tissue culture cells), and 53 sequence neighborhood descriptors. Most of the genomes with less bases stem from Africa, perhaps because of the fact that the Africa samples are older than Asia and South America ones. Further details are available in [ 81].
